chapters.title: Chapter 13: Rumors
chapters.info: Abell Cauthon, p. 234 (205)—Mat's father. He is excellent with a bow and arrow, and is in general a really nice guy; Mat does not know of anyone who does not like him. He has five children: Matrim, Bodewhin, and Eldrin, ages 20, 17, and 16, respectively, and two other daughters. His wife is Natti. See also Cauthon, Bodewhin; Cauthon, Eldrin; Cauthon, Matrim; Cauthon, Natti.
